name: Marcus's Helpful math in learning basic subjects in being cool

description:
Welcome to Marcus's helpful math it is a BBIEAL mod. you need to get all books to get out before Marcus gets you but be careful there are friends around so be careful and do not torch Marcus when he is angry or else it is game over

all of the code sounds and textures in this mod belong to there normal owners ok not me and I will see you in the next mod ok bye!!!
